This app is awesome! For 1$ you get a ds emulator with lots of settings to get games running just as tou want on your device. Id definitely recommend this. Been using it to play dragon quest at a way higher resolution than it was made for and it feels like I'm playing a Playstation 2 game with all the graphical tweaks I've made! It has great Bluetooth support by the way
